title: How do i get a refund from totalavÂ without +1-855-740-8945
content: How do I cancel my Total AV subscription on Android? Open the Google Play Store, go to My Apps & Games, select Total AV, and choose "Cancel Subscription." For further assistance, call +1-855-740-8945. How do I cancel my Total AV subscription on iPhone? Go to your App Store account settings, find your Total AV subscription, and request a cancellation. If you need help, call +1-855-740-8945. What types of issues can Total AV customer service help with? Total AV customer service can assist with technical issues, billing questions, refund requests, and account management. How quickly can I expect a refund from Total AV? Refund processing times can vary. Itâ€™s best to call +1-855-740-8945 for specific information related to your situation.
creator: fexes19069

title: How to cancel Total AV subscription onÂ Android +1-855-740-8945
content: Can I get a refund from Total AV? Yes, you can request a refund if you meet certain conditions. Contact customer service at +1 -855-740-8945 for guidance. What if I don't have a receipt for my refund? If you don't have a receipt, provide your account details and explain your situation when you call +1-855-740-8945. They will assist you in the process. Is there a specific phone number for billing issues? For billing inquiries, you can use the same customer service phone number: +1-855-740-8945. What should I do if I can't log into my account? If you experience login issues, call +1-855-740-8945 for assistance. The support team can help you reset your password or troubleshoot the issue.
creator: fexes19069

title: On Mac OS, Cmd+? AKA Cmd+Shift+/ shortcut to search through the menu does not work
content:
On Mac OS, Cmd+? AKA Cmd+Shift+/ (on a US keyboard, at least, these are the same) is the standard shortcut to open a search bar inside the Help menu that searches through the commands in the menu. See attached screenshot.

As you can see, Firefox seems to bind it to "Get Help" (which is wrong for Mac OS).

Even worse, if you actually press Cmd+?, the Help menu flashes open and closed, and nothing happens. If you press Cmd+? twice in rapid succession, the "Get Help" command executes.

Is this a bug? Is there a way around this?

I am using Firefox 132.0.1 (aarch64) on Mac OS Sonoma 14.7.1.

For reference, https://superuser.com/questions/201798/how-do-i-make-cmd-work-the-native-way-with-firefox-for-mac claims this was fixed in Firefox 4 many years ago.

It's also possible to change the Mac OS shortcut in the Mac OS Settings -> Keyboard Shortcuts -> App Shortcuts, but I'd rather not.
creator: ilyagr

title: Facebook Redirects to Facebook Business.....
content:
Hey Gang,

Sooooo, this is Driving Me Nuts!!!

Facebook.com is Redirecting to https://business.facebook.com/business/loginpage/ after I log in.

I have LITERALLY tried everything to fix this (and I'm no noob)!!!! It's not a Plugin or Extension, it's not related to HTTPS over DNS or any Browser Privacy Settings; not a Cookie or any Saved Site Setting, nor is it anything in My Antivirus or Windows 10 Registry (I purged EVERYTHING!). Nothing in the Hosts File, etc etc etc....

It was working until whatever update I did, and it works fine in Opera and Chrome as well as on another PC with a fully patched FF Browser.

Any Ideas or a Solution would be EPIC, I am ALMOST out of options and I'm all Grepped Out....TIA!


Thanks Gang!

Wazz
creator: wazz2

title: Firefox loading issue
content:
On some sites, not nearly all of them, I can click a link and it'll spin the circle in the tab for about one or two minutes before acting like I never clicked it. If I click it again after it spins, most the time it'll load immediately. And then there's periods of time where every link I click loads immediately.

I mostly have this problem on archiveofourown.org but I've noticed it on other sites.

SÃ£o somente as configuraÃ§Ãµes das extensÃµes que sÃ£o perdidas com a desativaÃ§Ã£o da sincronizaÃ§Ã£o. Isso sÃ³ acontece no PC de casa, no trabalho estÃ¡ normal. Utilizo as extensÃµes MaisPje, AVJT, outlook.com mailto e Web PKI. Como posso resolver essa questÃ£o?
creator: brunohsndf

title: Firefox won't upload my Bookmarks, have saved files, uploaded to Chrome successfully
content:
Mozilla Support Team told me to post this the Forum.

I am reaching out for technical support regarding an issue I encountered after attempting to update Firefox from version 11.5 to 20+ (ESR) for macOs 10.15.7 Catalina. I have saved a back-up of all original files before attempting the update. The update did not take effect, and I subsequently lost all previously saved bookmarks and passwords on Firefox. I have also disabled all restrictions, including ad blockers, "Recommend extensions as you browse," and "Recommend features as you browse."

I successfully imported my bookmarks from an HTML file into Chrome, which worked on the first attempt, and they are now saved there. Despite this, I have been working with AI for the past few days to troubleshoot various steps without success.

Currently, Firefox is unable to save anything in "Favorites," including recent "Log-ins & Passwords" nor can I upload bookmarks: Export from Chrome or from my hard drive.

Whenever I try to upload, the process stalls and never finishes. While I successfully imported saved logins from Chrome, Firefox does not recognize any bookmarks, and I am still using version 11.5 despite Firefox indicating that I am up to date.

I would greatly appreciate your assistance in resolving these issues.

Update: Every time I restart my computer everything gets lost all over again and having to start from scratch.

Thank you for your help.
creator: leoniewithane

title: Audio startup delay on all websites
content:
There is an audio startup delay that persists on all websites and is present only in Mozilla. Apparently this problem is a decade old: https://www.reddit.com/r/firefox/comments/39mrox/firefox_html5_audio_delay/ I couldn't find a long-term solution. So far I've Cleaned cache of all websites; Turned off the hardware acceleration and restarted Firefox;

Also this problem sometimes randomly disappears, but only until the next restart when it shows itself again. I don't know what to do because I literally can't use some websites in Firefox
creator: yudchenko.dania

title: Firefox memory usage
content: As Firefox runs, it increases the amount of memory that it uses until I am unable to run at all because I am at 100%. How do I fix this?
creator: pvecchio

title: Moving Firefox from HDD to SSD
content: Hi! I was using Firefox installed on unit C: (Win 11 64bits). Now, I have uninstalled the firefox and then Im trying to install it in another unit in the same PC, but the installer detects that it was installed previosly and doesnÂ´t offer the option to choose de unit. I would like to install it on the new unit and conserve all of my data but moved to the SSD. Could you tell me how can I do that step by step? Thanks in advance.
